abstract: Even Toyota Motor, Japan’s largest automaker, felt the pain in the first quarter from the collapsing market for big pickups and sport utility vehicles in the United States.
snippet: Even Toyota Motor, Japan’s largest automaker, felt the pain in the first quarter from the collapsing market for big pickups and sport utility vehicles in the United States.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Even Toyota Motor, Japan’s largest automaker, felt the pain in the first quarter from the collapsing market for big pickups and sport utility vehicles in the United States.

headline.main: Toyota Profit Slips 28% as Truck Sales Fall
headline.print_headline: Toyota Profit Slips 28% as Truck Sales Fall
